verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%>. The <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H2377>vision<s%> of <S%H5151>Nahum<s%> the <S%H512>Elkoshite<s%>.

<S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H7072>jealous<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5358>revengeth<s%>; the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5358>revengeth<s%>, and is <S%H1167%H2534>furious<s%>; the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will take <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> on his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, and he <S%H5201>reserveth<s%> wrath for his <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%>, and <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H3581>power<s%>, and will not at <S%H5352>all<s%> <S%H5352>acquit<s%> the wicked: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath his <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%> and in the <S%H8183>storm<s%>, and the <S%H6051>clouds<s%> are the <S%H80>dust<s%> of his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

He <S%H1605>rebuketh<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and maketh it <S%H2717>dry<s%>, and drieth <S%H3001>up<s%> all the <S%H5104>rivers<s%>: <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H535>languisheth<s%>, and <S%H3760>Carmel<s%>, and the <S%H6525>flower<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H535>languisheth<s%>.

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7493>quake<s%> at him, and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H4127>melt<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H5375>burned<s%> at his <S%H6440>presence<s%>, yea, the <S%H8398>world<s%>, and all that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

Who can <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H2195>indignation<s%>? and who can <S%H6965>abide<s%> in the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%>? his <S%H2534>fury<s%> is poured <S%H5413>out<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%>, and the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> are thrown <S%H5422>down<s%> by him.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>, a strong <S%H4581>hold<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>; and he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> them that <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.

But with an <S%H5674>overrunning<s%> <S%H7858>flood<s%> he will <S%H6213>make<s%> an utter <S%H3617>end<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> thereof, and <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

What do ye <S%H2803>imagine<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? he will <S%H6213>make<s%> an utter <S%H3617>end<s%>: <S%H6869>affliction<s%> shall not rise <S%H6965>up<s%> the second <S%H6471>time<s%>.

For while they be folden <S%H5440>together<s%> as <S%H5518>thorns<s%>, and while they are <S%H5433>drunken<s%> as <S%H5435>drunkards<s%>, they shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> as <S%H7179>stubble<s%> <S%H4392>fully<s%> <S%H3002>dry<s%>.
There is one come <S%H3318>out<s%> of thee, that <S%H2803>imagineth<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, a <S%H1100>wicked<s%> <S%H3289>counseller<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Though they be <S%H8003>quiet<s%>, and likewise <S%H7227>many<s%>, yet thus shall they be cut <S%H1494>down<s%>, when he shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%>. Though I have <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> thee, I will <S%H6031>afflict<s%> thee no more.
For now will I <S%H7665>break<s%> his <S%H4132>yoke<s%> from off thee, and will <S%H5423>burst<s%> thy <S%H4147>bonds<s%> in <S%H5423>sunder<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath given a <S%H6680>commandment<s%> concerning thee, that no more of thy <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H2232>sown<s%>: out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H430>gods<s%> will I cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the graven <S%H6459>image<s%> and the molten <S%H4541>image<s%>: I will <S%H7760>make<s%> thy <S%H6913>grave<s%>; for thou art <S%H7043>vile<s%>.

Behold upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of him that bringeth good <S%H1319>tidings<s%>, that <S%H8085>publisheth<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>! O <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H2287>keep<s%> thy solemn <S%H2282>feasts<s%>, <S%H7999>perform<s%> thy <S%H5088>vows<s%>: for the <S%H1100>wicked<s%> shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> pass <S%H5674>through<s%> thee; he is utterly cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
